evidence.claim: Hallmark Homecare emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations on their services.
The company offers integration with electronic health records (EHR) but lacks specific details on APIs.
Hallmark Homecare provides care analytics but does not publicly disclose specific data platforms or methodologies.
The website mentions care coordination which implies the use of health data exchange standards but does not specify.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found regarding X12 or API automation uses.
